about_us.name: Civil Law
about_us.description: We practice civil law at our law firm. Any kind of house, property, family matters can be consulted with us.

about_us.name: Law of Taxation
about_us.description: We practice law of taxation at our law firm. Any kind of issues related to taxes like income tax, property tax, company tax, customs can be consulted with us.

about_us.name: Administrative Law
about_us.description: We practice Administrative Law at our law firm. Any kind of legal issues related with the administration of any company, organization or family can be consulted with us.

about_us.name: Business and Corporate Law
about_us.description: We provide legal assistace to the business firms and registered bisiness bodies also provide legal assistance to unregistererd business firms in the process of being legal.

about_us.name: Foregin Investment Law
about_us.description: We provide legal assistace to the companies and bodies that are going to keep international relation in businesses or any other activies with the bodies outside the boundry of Nepal.

about_us.name: Criminal Justice
about_us.description: Innocent till proven guilty is the major motto of our firm. We provide the necessary aid to the bodies that requires aid in the field of criminal justice.

about_us.name: Banking / Finance Law
about_us.description: We provide the legal assistance and advisory in the areas of banking sectors. We also provide legal assistance to the different bodies in finance and Co-Operative sectors in Nepal.

about_us.name: Legal-Translation
about_us.description: We translate your documents in the different languges. Legal papers from citizenship,passports to the legal notices, and papers are translated.

about_us.name: Miscellaneous
about_us.description: Other serives like Notary, Employment Law, Constitutional law, Writ Jurisdiction, Legal Research, Hydro Power Law, Electricity Law and Information and Technology Law are also practiced in this firm.

clientRequests.Name: Saumya Bhandari
clientRequests.Problem Description: I am once again asking for your financial support.
